entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
